title: Pentagon Designates Anthropic Supply Chain Risk Over AI Military Dispute
description: Anthropic on Friday hit back after U.S. Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth directed the Pentagon to designate the artificial intelligence (AI) upstart as a "supply chain risk."
